title: Pierce Brosnan
summary: Pierce Brendan Brosnan OBE (/ˈbrɒsnən/; born 16 May 1953)[1] is an Irish actor and film producer. He is best known as the fifth actor to play secret agent James Bond in the Bond film series, starring in four films from 1995 to 2002 (GoldenEye, Tomorrow Never Dies, The World Is Not Enough, and Die Another Day) and portraying the character in multiple video games.
